metadata.title: CVE-2018-7226 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in vcSetXCutTextProc() in VNConsole.c in LinuxVNCand VNCommand from the LibVNC/vncterm distribution through 0.9.10. Missingsanitization of the client-specified message length may cause integeroverflow or possibly have unspecified other impact via a specially craftedVNC packet.

criterions.comment: vncterm package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
